definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation elseif="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_isonground"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="set_armor_animation"><field name="name">CUSTOM:WhiteCape</field><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value><value name="animation"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">float2</field></block></value></block></statement><value name="IF1"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_isonground"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO1"><block type="stop_armor_animation"><field name="name">CUSTOM:WhiteCape</field><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
